content: row 11 4 if making a white wing bind off and weave in your end if making a black wing match it up to a white wing and crochet around and through the edges of both wings to connect them together when making the second wing make sure you do not make it facing the same direction as the first one think right hand and left hand tail row instruction stitch 1 using black 4 chain 2 4 single_crochet in second chain from hook join chain 1 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around including the joining stitch from the last 5 round or increase in one stitch if you are working in a spiral 3 1 increase 1 single_crochet 1 increase 1 single_crochet 1 increase 8 4 *1 single_crochet 1 increase* around 12 5 *2 single_crochet 1 increase* around 16 6 work even 16 bind off leave a long
